description: Even without "verbose=1" in nova-api.conf and without "--verbose" in nova.conf, nova-api continues to log messages at DEBUG level. For consistency when verbose is not set it should log at INFO level.
title: nova-api unconditionally logs at DEBUG level

comments.content: Even without "verbose=1" in nova-api.conf and without "--verbose" in nova.conf, nova-api continues to log messages at DEBUG level. For consistency when verbose is not set it should log at INFO level.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content: My fix conflicts with Vish's, so I'll withdraw and merge his.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
